XII.i.3.F.2.a
.
Criteria for Deferring Award Action in DIC Awards Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) awards under
38 U.S.C. 1151
are subject to offset effective the first of the month after the month during which the judgment becomes final.
Do
not
defer a DIC award just because a tort claim has been filed
unless
there is reason to believe it has been finalized.
